::KitKat::

She was hit in the side.  She turned and returned fire on Airbomber.
She felt stupid for trying to help a Maximal.  She fired off three 
rounds at Airbomber.  Her side felt like it was fire from the hit it 
took.


--- In nbwrpg@egroups.com, "THECODE" <thecode@p...> wrote:
> Airbomber stood up and fired at KitKat once, at Drill Bit twice...
> ----- Original Message ----- 
> From: <logomorph@h...>
> To: <nbwrpg@egroups.com>
> Sent: Saturday, August 26, 2000 6:22 PM
> Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars
> 
> 
> > ::KitKat::
> > 
> > She looked at Megatron, who looked like he was about to scrap 
her.  
> > She turned and looked at Drillbit.  She smiled at him.  "Put 
> > Airbomber outside. Just shove him outthere and hope they shoot 
him 
> > up.  He sin't of any use to us.  He knows nothing.  Just toss him 
out 
> > and forget him." 
> > 
> > She looked at Megatron.  She was afraid of him, and it was writen 
on 
> > her face.  BUt she would stand her ground.  "Commander, Phobis 
had 
> > said he had other weapons taht would aid us.  In trying to save 
> > Etchingar, who didn't make it, I retireved a highly specialized 
> > energon rifle.  Phobia has promised other weapons.  I....I was 
trying 
> > to get you more weapons Commander Megatron."
> > She waited for him to beat the armor of her.
